name: Bubblegum POP
description:
Once Upon a time, Pinky challenges Bluey to beat his record of staying airborne using helium and bubblegum. You take control of Bluey, and help him avoid flocks of birds and maintaining safe altitude.

Move Bluey with the left and right arrow keys. 

Press space to blow the bubble and stay airborne, but you won't be able to blow if your lungs don't contain enough air. 

To refill your lungs, move towards floating balloons whenever possible.

Feedback is kindly welcomed
